content: over half of your stitches we will put the other half of your stitches - aka the instep - on hold by the end of the heel flap you should have a square of fabric coming off the leg row 1 k32 turn row 2 *sl1wyif p1* repeat from * to * 15 times more turn continue to ignore your instep stitches 3 row 3 sl1 k31 turn row 4 *sl1wyif p1* repeat from * to * 15 times more turn repeat row 3 and 4 until you have worked a total of 32 row you should see 16 slipped stitches along each edge of your heel flap turn the heel row 5 k18 ssk k1 turn you should see a gap appear between the stitches you just worked and the unworked stitches on the needle row 6 sl1wyif p6 p2tog p1 turn you should see a similar gap appear on the this end of your needle row 7 sl1 knit to one stitch before the gap ssk one stitch from either side of the gap k1 turn row 8 sl1wyif purl to one stitch before the gap p2tog one stitch from either side of the gap p1 turn repeat row 7 and 8 until you have worked across all the stitches of your heel flap row 9 knit across your heel flap needle there should be 18 stitches remaining across your heel flap picking up the gusset after slipping the first stitch of every row in your heel flap you should see 16 slipped stitches along each side of your heel flap using a new needle and moving along the side of your heel flap towards your instep pick up and knit 1 stitch in each of these slipped stitches when you reach your instep stitches pick up and knit 1 extra stitch in the corner space in between your needles knit across your instep stitches using a new needle pick pick up and knit 1 extra stitch in the corner space just like you did for the first side of your heel flap using the same needle and moving along the side of your heel flap towards the underside of your heel pick up and knit 1 stitch in each of the 16 slipped stitches you should have 18 stitches along the heel 17 stitches along the first side of your gusset 32 stitches along the instep and 17 stitches along the second side of your gusset move your bor marker to the middle of your heel stitches and rearrange your stitches as follows 4 dpns place all your instep stitches on one needle move half your heel stitches onto each gusset needle from the bor your final arrangement should be 26 heel +gusset stitches on needle 1 32 instep stitches on needle 2 and 26 heel+gusset stitches on needle
